name: Slasher Lock
description:
Game created for the "My First GameJam 2021 Winter" with the theme "Locked"

In this game we explored the concept of locking and unlocking doors while you are chased by a typical slasher movie killer in a top down mansion. Your goal is to find all the keys and escape the house before the slasher catches you!

Made by Red Rat Team:

  • Gustavo Passos 
  • Luiz Strobelt
  • Lucas Teles
